text: The Austrian Hockey League (Erste Bank Eishockey Liga) for sponsorship reasons, is the top level of ice hockey in Austria. EC KAC has won the most league titles, with 23. ==Teams== Team City/Area Arena Capacity Founded Joined EBEL Current Teams Current Teams Current Teams Current Teams Current Teams Current Teams Graz
